title: Three cheese macaroni pasta bake
ingredients: ['900g macaroni pasta', '285g grated Emmental or Gruyere cheese', '285g grated mozzarella cheese', '285g grated Cheddar cheese', '120ml milk', 'salt to taste', '1/8 teaspoon onion powder', '1 pinch garlic granules', '1/4 teaspoon dried parsley', '3 tablespoons butter or margarine']
